title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 506 - Medical Assistance Rates Of Payment For Intensive Case Management Services (icm), Supportive Case Management (scm) And Blended Icm/scm Case Management Services
content:

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
